des: "This beetroot relish is delicious, especially when served with lamb. The texture can be adjusted to your own liking, and I suggest it be somewhat chunky to give a contrast to the smoothness of the lamb. This recipe was in a book of notes from my grandmother, and tastes amazing."
ins:
In a large pot, combine the beets, onion, red bell pepper, celery, sugar, and cauliflower. Season with salt,  mustard seed, and celery seed, then stir in vinegar. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.
Simmer, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes.
